ygData.subject: Re: Fw: [EQMagicians] Just a thought..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have rogue, magician, and shaman (my primary) characters in addition to my necro. Now granted I m only at level 6, but so far this has been my easiest
ygData.messageBody:
> So if you can make a list of things that you are pissed off about
> the Necromancer, I think we can discuss them and maybe understand each
> other's position better. PErsonally I think we're one of the best of the
> lot. Just about everyone I know has a MUCH harder time with just about
> everything else (except druids, DAMN, what's up with these guys that allow
> them to frikkin jump into the high end in like weeks?!?! That's
> what I want
> to know!)

I have rogue, magician, and shaman (my primary) characters in addition to my
necro. Now granted I'm only at level 6, but so far this has been my easiest
character by far. I can take on a yellow monster with a bit of luck, and
whites are a no brainer. My shaman (lvl 11) has been slain by blue critters,
can take a white only if the gods are smiling on him and then will finish
the battle at zero mana and almost no health, and yellow is a death wish.

Magician is a bit better, but his run-ins with yellows have been horrific.
Rogue is worst of all, of course. So (in MY experience, anyway), of these 4
classes, necro is the strongest. You want weak? try a rogue... heh
